title: Italian Weinstein accuser turns ire on Berlusconi
text:
Italian Weinstein accuser turns ire on Berlusconi Friday, March 02, 2018 - 02:13 
Asia Argento, one of Weinstein's first accusers, helped inspire #MeToo. But she mainly met with scorn in her native Italy. Now she's gone on the attack against scandal-ridden Silvio Berlusconi, the former prime minister who wants to stage a comeback in Sunday's election. Lucy Fielder reports
